channel.title: Error Connecting to server look help
channel.description:
Hi, i download allstar server source and i compiled it and all that, then i runned my server. At the same time i got my no-ip running in the background and it had the happy smiley face and said all dns connected. I have also port forwarded but im not 100 procent sure ive done it the right way. Or well im gonna upload a picture of how my port forwarding looks like. But before i do that i still have something to say, when i run my server it says Allstarscape v1 online, that's great because it works :). Now when i have my no-ip running at the same time, it is lasseown.no-ip.biz now when i enter it on silab and enter my username and pass that i want it gives me this error connecting to server unless how many times i try, i also tryed to disable my norton firewall i don't have Windows firewall on, and i also port forwarded btw, I CAN ONLY connect to my server if i use this 127.0.0.1 if i connect via 127.0.0.1 i get into allstar scape and i could also make my self owner server is fine, but no one else can join on this ip lasseown.no-ip.biz. Now i will post a picture of how i port forward i have zyXel.
[URL=http://img159.imageshack.us/my.php?image=unavngivetjq8.gif][IMG]http://img159.imageshack.us/img159/7258/unavngivetjq8.th.gif[/img][/URL]
And i did set my virables and i did make my no-ip and my server works its just i cant connect to my no-ip.biz only my 127.0.0.1 and that makes no one else can connect? I havent added my server on moparscape server list is thats why its down? Or maybe my port forwarding have been done incorectly? please help!

item.title: Error Connecting to server look help
item.dc:creator: @jackin_jill jackin jill
item.description:
@jackin_jill wrote:

go to

WhatIsMyIP.com®

What Is My IP? Shows your real IP - IPv4 - IPv6 - WhatIsMyIP.com®

IPv4 Address, IPv6 Address, IP Address Lookup, Change IP, Hide IP, IP WHOIS, Internet Speed Test, Trace An Email, Host Name Lookup, User Agent, Server Headers Check, IP Commands


thats the ip u should be useing. to make a no-ip. u need to use that number not your original ip
try it out

Read full topic
item.source: Error Connecting to server look help

item.title: Error Connecting to server look help
item.dc:creator: @lasseown lasseown
item.description:
@lasseown wrote:

I entered my real ip and clicked save, but it just didnt work at all? My router haves to be damaged or something i don’t know whats blocking it. Btw when i started my server i could only see this “Allstarscape online v1” I couldnt see anything about the port i was using, i also tryed with an static ip but for gods sakes that didnt work eithter! People i really want my server up an running i really want man! But when i connect to 127.0.0.1 I CAN GO TO MY SERVER AND MAKE MY SELF ADMIN BUT HOW ARE ANYONE ELSE SUPOSE TO JOIN MY SERVER VIA 127.0.0.1 THE lasseown.no-ip.biz haves to work! And also my norton said "Norton antivirus have maked own rules for no-ip or whats program called i dont really know whats goin on :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2008, 04:33:12 am[/size][hr]Bump, i really need some help i tryed the whole day yesterday to get it to work! Omg i also uploadet a picture isn’t that enough :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2008, 04:34:11 am[/size][hr]Omg i could really need some help i tryed the whole day yesterday no on have any suggestions??

Read full topic
item.source: Error Connecting to server look help

item.title: Error Connecting to server look help
item.dc:creator: @CrnJacKer CrnJacKer
item.description:
@CrnJacKer wrote:

I am not sure, although have you used your IP when you portforwarded?

if you did, then its right.

but i dont see the prob…

Since i havent seen your router company type before…

-CrnJacKer

Read full topic
